mapper.insert: insert into sys_push_task (request_id, ai_config_id, wecom_config_id, prompt_key, msg_type, receivers, receiver_group, payload, ai_result, status, error_msg, send_time, create_by, create_time) values (#{requestId}, #{aiConfigId}, #{wecomConfigId}, #{promptKey}, #{msgType}, #{receivers}, #{receiverGroup}, #{payload}, #{aiResult}, #{status}, #{errorMsg}, #{sendTime}, #{createBy}, #{createTime})
